          <title>
            <string language="en">Series circuits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Serie Stromkreise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuits de série</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuitos da série</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυκλώματα σειράς</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of three illustrations showing light bulbs and batteries connected in series.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">battery</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von drei Abbildungen schaltete das Zeigen 
der Glühlampen und der Batterien in der Reihe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de trois illustrations montrer les 
ampoules et les batteries s'est relié en série.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de três ilustrações mostrar 
bulbos claros e baterias conectou em série.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di tre illustrazioni mostrare le 
lampadine e le batterie ha collegato in serie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν ελαφριούς 
βολβούς και των μπαταριών που συνδέονται στη σειρά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de tres ilustraciones mostrar bombillas y
las baterías conectó en serie.</string>
          </description>
